reasons_to_visit.details: Prague offers spectacular New Year's fireworks over the Old Town, creating a magical start to the year with historic backdrops.
Snow-covered Prague Castle and Charles Bridge create a fairy-tale atmosphere perfect for photography and romantic walks.
Perfect time to explore Prague's museums, galleries, and historic interiors without summer crowds.
Traditional Czech beer halls provide warm refuge with hearty local cuisine and excellent Czech beer.
Off-season rates for accommodations and fewer tourists mean a more authentic local experience.

reasons_to_avoid.details: January temperatures often drop below freezing, requiring warm winter clothing for outdoor sightseeing.
Short winter days with limited sunlight can affect outdoor activity timing and photography opportunities.
